name: Dr Alexander Tsimbalist
quote: As both an implantologist and a practice owner, the ability to receive next-day payments and reduce our payment processing fees has been a game-changer for us. With high operating costs in our field, the savings offered by Prompt Pay Capital have had a real impact on our bottom line. Alex handled the terminal setup smoothly and provided hands-on support to our receptionist, Claudia, ensuring everything integrates seamlessly with our accounting system. I've already recommended Prompt Pay Capital to several colleagues in the dental and medical field
